docs.text: 1. Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. 2. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. 3. 网站 官网 中文翻译 知乎 少数派 $ mkdocs --version 4. 入门 $ mkdocs new my-project $ cd my-project 在mkdocs.yml的同级目录中启动服务器 $ mkdocs serve http://127.0.0.1:8000/ 生成文档，创建一个名为site的新目录 $ mkdocs build
